title: Bloodlust
description: Jonas Cane is a peace officer with a problem; he has a gift that allows him to anticipate what others are doing. The gift has allowed him to become the fastest draw in the west; however, it has come with a price-- painful headachesâ€¦ and fragmented dreams.Evil has come to the Arizona Territory and Cane's power seems to be ineffective in tracking down a deranged killer.
author: P.K. Vandcast
